description: Sonny Carey scores twice as Blackpool end Reading's 11-game unbeaten run to dent the Royals' play-off push with a 3-0 victory at Bloomfield Road.
title: Blackpool 3-0 Reading
maintext:
Blackpool have won five of their last seven league games against Reading (L2), scoring 2.6 goals-per-game on average during that time.
Reading have failed to win any of their last eight away league games against Blackpool (D2 L6) since a 2-0 win at Bloomfield Road in August 2001.
In his managerial career, Blackpoolâ€™s Steve Bruce has only lost two of his 11 previous league meetings with Reading (W6 D3), with both defeats coming in 2017 in his time at Aston Villa.
